attribute.name: location
attribute.semantics: The geodetic position of the vehicle.

attribute.name: velocity
attribute.semantics: The angular and linear velocity of the vehicle.

attribute.name: sceneObjectName
attribute.semantics: If the location is meant to be relative this is the hla object name of the parent object.

objectClass.name: FGAirVehicle
objectClass.semantics: Generic vehicle like object in the scene. Subscribe to this as a radar station.

attribute.name: callSign
attribute.semantics: The call sign of the air vehicle.

attribute.name: transponder
attribute.semantics: The transponder response of the vehicle.

attribute.name: simTime
attribute.semantics: The local simulation time of that multiplayer.

objectClass.name: FGView
objectClass.semantics: A view that is defined in the scene.

attribute.name: name
attribute.semantics: The name of the view.

attribute.name: location
attribute.semantics: The relative or absolute position and orientation of the view.

attribute.name: sceneObjectName
attribute.semantics: The hla object name of the a FGSceneObject that is referenced by this view.

objectClass.name: FGViewer
objectClass.semantics: A viewer that needs to be coordinated or remote controlled.

attribute.name: name
attribute.semantics: The name of the view.

objectClass.name: FGPerspectiveViewer
objectClass.semantics: A perspective viewer - the usual simulation viewer.

attribute.name: viewName
attribute.semantics: The name of the view that is viewer is attached to.

attribute.name: location
attribute.semantics: The relative or absolute position/orientation of the viewer.

attribute.name: zoomFactor
attribute.semantics: A zoom factor for the projections system. Leave at 1 for an immersive system.

attribute.name: eyeTrackerName
attribute.semantics: The name of the view that is viewer is attached to.

objectClass.name: FGEyeTracker
objectClass.semantics: A head tracking offset that can be attached to a viewer system.

attribute.name: leftEyeOffset
attribute.semantics: The relative position of the left eye within the projection system. Use for eye tracking.

attribute.name: rightEyeOffset
attribute.semantics: The relative position of the right eye within the projection system. Use for eye tracking.

objectClass.name: FGRenderer
objectClass.semantics: A renderer is an application that provides one or more drawables.

attribute.name: name
attribute.semantics: The name of the renderer.

objectClass.name: FGDrawable
objectClass.semantics: Part of a renderer. Somewhere to draw something.

attribute.name: name
attribute.semantics: The name of the drawable.

attribute.name: renderer
attribute.semantics: The name of the renderer this drawable belongs to.

attribute.name: display
attribute.semantics: The designator of the X11 display if the renderer lives on X11.

attribute.name: fullscreen
attribute.semantics: True if fullscreen.

attribute.name: position
attribute.semantics: The upper left corner of the window on the screen.

attribute.name: size
attribute.semantics: The size of the window.

objectClass.name: FGCamera
objectClass.semantics: Part of a viewer. Subsegment of a multi view viewer.

attribute.name: name
attribute.semantics: The name of the camera.

attribute.name: viewer
attribute.semantics: The viewer this camera belongs to.

attribute.name: drawable
attribute.semantics: The drawable this camera lives in.

attribute.name: viewport
attribute.semantics: The viewport within the drawable for this camera.

attribute.name: location
attribute.semantics: The position and orientation offset within the viewer.

attribute.name: projection
attribute.semantics: The projection of this camera.

attribute.name: projection
attribute.semantics: The projection of this camera.

transportation.name: HLAreliable
transportation.description: Provide reliable delivery of data in the sense that TCP/IP delivers its data reliably

transportation.name: HLAbestEffort
transportation.description: Make an effort to deliver data in the sense that UDP provides best-effort delivery

basicData.name: HLAinteger16BE
basicData.encoding: 16-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger32BE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger64BE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit two's complement signed integer first. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAfloat32BE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit IEEE normalized single-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985

basicData.name: HLAfloat64BE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit IEEE normalized double-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985

basicData.name: HLAoctetPairBE
basicData.encoding: Assumed to be portable among hardware devices.

basicData.name: HLAinteger16LE
basicData.encoding: 16-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger32LE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger64LE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit two's complement signed integer first. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAfloat32LE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit IEEE normalized single-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985

basicData.name: HLAfloat64LE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit IEEE normalized double-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985

basicData.name: HLAoctetPairLE
basicData.encoding: Assumed to be portable among hardware devices.

basicData.name: HLAoctet
basicData.encoding: Assumed to be portable among hardware devices.

basicData.name: UnsignedShort
basicData.encoding: 16-bit unsigned integer. (WARNING: unsigned integers are not directly supported by JAVA).

basicData.name: UnsignedLong
basicData.encoding: 32-bit unsigned integer. (WARNING: unsigned integers are not directly supported by JAVA).

simpleData.name: HLAASCIIchar
simpleData.semantics: Standard ASCII character (see ANSI Std x3.4-1986

simpleData.name: HLAunicodeChar
simpleData.semantics: Unicode UTF-16 character (see The Unicode Standard, Version 3.0)

enumeratedData.name: FGTransponderModeType
enumeratedData.semantics: The type of the transponder echo.

enumeratedData.name: SGmultiplayerPropertyType
enumeratedData.semantics: The name of the property to transfer for the multiplayer attribute

arrayData.name: SGOrientation
arrayData.semantics: Orientation represented as vector part of the quaternion.

arrayData.name: SGmultiplayerPropertyArray
arrayData.semantics: Array of generic multiplayer properties - temporary encoding for now

fixedRecordData.name: SGModel
fixedRecordData.semantics: The model data of an ai model

fixedRecordData.name: SGLocation
fixedRecordData.semantics: Cartesian location consisting of a position and orientation.

field.name: angular
field.semantics: Angular velocity vector in body coordinates

field.name: linear
field.semantics: Linear velocity vector in body coordinates

field.name: left
field.semantics: Left border of the projection space.

field.name: right
field.semantics: Right border of the projection space.

field.name: bottom
field.semantics: Bottom border of the projection space.

field.name: top
field.semantics: Top border of the projection space.

field.name: distance
field.semantics: The reference distance the above values are meant for. Similar to the near plane but does not impact clipping.

field.name: left
field.semantics: Left border of the projection space.

field.name: right
field.semantics: Right border of the projection space.

field.name: bottom
field.semantics: Bottom border of the projection space.

field.name: top
field.semantics: Top border of the projection space.

variantRecordData.semantics: The content of an aircraft typical transponder.
variantRecordData.name: FGTransponderType
